name: 王賢達
objective: 課程主要目標為光譜學方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅外、核磁(氫,碳,二維, 氟,氮,磷,矽)等光譜法及質譜。
schedule:
1.　　Ultraviolet spectrometry(2 wks)
2.　　Infrared spectrometry(2 wks)
3.　　Proton NMR spectrometry(2 wks)
4.　　Carbon-13 NMR spectrometry(2 wks)
5.　　Mid-term exam(1 wk)
6.　　Correlation NMR spectrometry(2-D NMR)(2 wks)
7.　　Mass spectrometry(3 wks)
8.　　Solved problems(2 wks)
9.     F-19, Si-29, N-15, P-31 NMR spectrometry(1 wk)
10.　　Final exam(1 wk)
scorePolicy:
Term performance and attendance(30%)
Mid-term exam(30%)
Final exam(40%)
materials:
Spectrometric Identification of Organic Compounds
(Robert M. Silverstein, Francis X. Webster, David Kiemle) 7th ed.
